preprocess.from sentence: For MS - MARCO , we preprocess the corpus with the reversible tokenizer from Stanford CoreNLP and we choose the span that achieves the highest ROUGE - L score with the reference answers as the gold span for training .

300 - D pre-trained Glove embeddings.from sentence: We employ the 300 - D pre-trained Glove embeddings and keep it fixed during training .

character embeddings.from sentence: The character embeddings are randomly initialized with its dimension as 30 .
